item.title: Transcend Launches SSD With MagSafe Compatibility
item.description: Transcend today announced the launch of the ESD420, a portable SSD that includes a magnetic attachment designed to work with MagSafe iPhones. The ESD420 can be attached to the back of a MagSafe-compat
